RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHISKEY ROAN away alertly, set all the pace under pressure and wore down rivals in a game effort. MR CLINE never far back, loomed boldly four wide into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead past the furlong marker and was denied. ON SPOT pressed the pace two wide until deep stretch then faded. FISHING FOR FUN vied for the lead three wide, drew closer nearing the quarter pole then came up empty. GRAND DEAL close up along the inside, failed to respond. K P SILVER BULLET failed to menace. HAD RIGHT trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Roan
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, wore down rivals, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Cline
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly, 4 wide, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Fishing for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, inched closer 1/4 pole, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK ON KITTEN battled for the lead three wide until mid stretch then drew off late under a strong hand ride. ICONIC allowed to settle, had a mild late rally in the three path and got up for second. LEOMBRUNO dueled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then was outfinished. THE DRAKE unhurried early, closed a gap late in the five path. DERBYS MONEYMAKER was no factor. WILLY'S CASTLE was no threat. RULING FRONT contested the lead two wide into the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Iconic
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild rally 3path, up place

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALACTIC prompted the pace along the rail into the stretch, responded under left handed urging to make the lead at the furlong marker and and proved best under a strong hand ride. BRIG broke alertly, set a pressured pace three then two wide into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. GOLDEN MONEY allowed to settle, had a mild rally late in the four path. OHIO PLAYER close up from the start, improved position in the five path on the turn then came up empty. MISTER MOBIL was no factor. ROYAL'D pressed the pace two wide while between horses into the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Galactic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, perfect trip, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Royal'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, between horses, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild rally late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Brig
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace 3-2wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. ( Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE'S FIRE always within striking distance, moved up steadily three wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch, was put to right handed pressure and drew off to win in hand. AUGER chased the pace into the turn, drew on even terms for the lead two wide at the quarter pole then was no match for the winner but held on for second. AUTHENTIC COWTOWN vied for the lead along the inside for a half, altered course to the five path then finished determinedly. DOCTOR WU failed to menace. DUKE OF DARKNESS away alertly, set the pace for a half then weakened. FIRST HOMESTEAD was no factor. BOURBON WISDOM trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Empire's Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady advance, 3 wide, drew off right urging, in hand late

ENTRY.NAME: Authentic Cowtown
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, altered course 5path top lane, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Auger
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, drew even 2 wide 1/4 pole, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Darkness
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace top lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAMONDS N DEW stalked the pace into the far turn, responded readily when set down, made the lead three wide nearing the quarter pole, drew off under right handed urging and was taken in hand late. MISSION GIRL pressed the pace three wide into the far turn, dropped back then came on again late in the five path to finish clear for second. LINE DANCER set the early pace off the rail in the four path, kept pressure two wide into the stretch, the rider lost his whip near the three sixteenths pole then finished evenly. ANGEL WINGS was in tight causing her rider to check repeatedly through the first turn, surged up the rail to make the lead after a half, set the pace into the far turn then weakened in the stretch. MOBIL CHIC also in tight on the first turn, failed to menace. NICEASAKITTENSEYES hopped at the start, raced outside and went evenly. ABIGAIL LEE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Line Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace off rail, kept on, lost whip top lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight first turn, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Angel Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, checked repeatedly first turn, led between calls,

ENTRY.NAME: Mission Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, dropped back, came again 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds N Dew
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, drew off, right urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 101. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATOMIC TONE prompted the pace three wide into the turn, made the lead at the five sixteenths pole, shook clear under right then left handed urging and won under confident handling. FIRST CITIZEN stalked the pace four wide, rallied into the stretch and gained second. JOHN'S ROCK never far back, swung wide and closed a gap late out pas the middle of the racetrack under left handed urging. NAUGHTY PRINCE close up, finished with good courage three wide. LATIN SPICE dueled for the lead along the inside until mid turn, kept on until mid stretch and weakened late. HOLY SAINT battled for the lead two wide into the turn and gave way late. DYRDEK trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Latin Spice
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside mid turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide mid turn, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Atomic Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, assumed command mid turn, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, late gain, past mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Prefer red).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEXY ANNA broke in front, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear before the furlong marker and prevailed under left handed urging in the three path. CAT'S RHYTHM trailed into the turn, swung wide, closed fast in the middle of the racetrack and just missed. RAINBOW SHIP allowed to settle, moved up four wide through the turn, drifted out through deep stretch and was outfinished despite a determined effort. PROPHETESS failed to menace. DIVA POWER with the second flight two wide, improved position on the turn then came up empty. A SMILE A DAY close up along the inside, weakened in the lane. FRONT CIRCLE was no threat. COWCHI pressed the pace along the inside into the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Vigil Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed fast mid track, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, improved turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Lexy Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, late rally, shook clear, lasted, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Rainbow Ship
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, drifted wide, outfinished, determinedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15 Allowed 2 l bs. A Race Since April 15 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURNING PAGES away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch then widened through the final furlong under right handed urging to win as much the best. KID RUSSELL pressured the winner along the inside into the stretch then was no match while second best. CHOCOLATE PHILLING stalked the pace between horses into the stretch and finished with good courage in the four path. CAVALETTO failed to menace. IN THE MIDST was no factor. YIPPEE KI YAY stalked the pace three wide and weakened in the stretch. RED COMET was a forward factor along the inside and weakened on the turn turn. A PRAYER FOR KIDS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Turning Pages
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2w, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Yippee Ki Yay
ENTRY.OWNER: Klein Jr Samuel and Kuntz Mark D
